German	B	German	Germany	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany	11867	/m/0345h
first-time
registrations
of
motor
vehicles
jumped
14.2
percent
in
July
this
year
from
the
year-earlier
period
,
the
Federal	B	Federal office for motor vehicles	--NME--
office	I	Federal office for motor vehicles	--NME--
for	I	Federal office for motor vehicles	--NME--
motor	I	Federal office for motor vehicles	--NME--
vehicles	I	Federal office for motor vehicles	--NME--
said
on
Thursday
.

The
office
said
356,725
new
cars
were
registered
in
July
1996
--
304,850
passenger
cars
and
15,613
trucks
.

The
figures
represent
a
13.6
percent
increase
for
passenger
cars
and
a
2.2
percent
decline
for
trucks
from
July
1995
.

Motor-bike
registration
rose
32.7
percent
in
the
period
.

The

was
partly
due
to
an
increased
number
of
Germans	B	Germans	Germany	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany	11867	/m/0345h
buying
German	B	German	Germany	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany	11867	/m/0345h
cars
abroad

on

.

Encephalopathy	I	Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy	--NME--
(
BSE	B	BSE	Bovine_spongiform_encephalopathy	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bovine_spongiform_encephalopathy	19344418	/m/0jy66
)
--
mad
cow
disease
.

But
some
members
of
the
EU	B	EU	--NME--
's
standing
veterinary
committee
questioned
whether
the
action
was
necessary
given
the
slight
risk
to
human
health
.

The
question
is
being
studied
separately
by
two
EU	B	EU	--NME--
scientific
committees
.

Sheep
have
long
been
known
to
contract
scrapie
,
a
similar
brain-wasting
disease
to
BSE	B	BSE	Bovine_spongiform_encephalopathy	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bovine_spongiform_encephalopathy	19344418	/m/0jy66
which
is
believed
to
have
been
transferred
to
cattle
through
feed
containing
animal
waste
.

British	B	British	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc
officials
say
sheep
meat
is
perfectly
safe
to
eat
.

ZDF	B	ZDF	ZDF	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ZDF	262201	/m/01mxgq
said
Germany	B	Germany	Germany	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany	11867	/m/0345h
imported
47,600
sheep
from
Britain	B	Britain	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc
last
year
,
nearly
half
of
total
imports
.

It
brought
in
4,275
tonnes
of
British	B	British	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc
mutton
,
some
10
percent
of
overall
imports
.

After
the
British	B	British	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc
government
admitted
a
possible
link
between
mad
cow
disease
and
its
fatal
human
equivalent
,
the
EU	B	EU	--NME--
imposed
a
worldwide
ban
on
British	B	British	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc
beef
exports
.

EU	B	EU	--NME--
leaders
agreed
at
a
summit
in
June
to
a
progressive
lifting
of
the
ban
as
Britain	B	Britain	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc
takes
parallel
measures
to
eradicate
the
disease
.

-DOCSTART- (58 ATHLETICS)
ATHLETICS
-
IT
'S
A
RECORD
-
40,000
BEERS
ON
THE
HOUSE
.

BRUSSELS	B	BRUSSELS	Brussels	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brussels	3708	/m/0177z
1996-08-22

Spectators
at
Friday
's
Brussels	B	Brussels	Brussels	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brussels	3708	/m/0177z
grand
prix
meeting
have
an
extra
incentive
to
cheer
on
the
athletes
to
world
record
performances
--
a
free
glass
of
beer
.

A
Belgian	B	Belgian	Belgium	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belgium	3343	/m/0154j
brewery
has
offered
to
pay
for
a
free
round
of
drinks
for
all
of
the
40,000
crowd
if
a
world
record
goes
at
the
meeting
,
organisers
said
on
Thursday
.

It
could
be
one
of
the
most
expensive
rounds
of
drinks
ever
.

The
meeting
is
sold
out
already
.

Two
world
records
are
in
serious
danger
of
being
broken
at
the
meeting
--
the
women
's
1,000
metres
and
the
men
's
3,000
metres
.

-DOCSTART- (67 Measles)

-
study
.

LONDON	B	LONDON	London	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London	17867	/m/04jpl
1996-08-23

Women
who
get
measles
while
pregnant
may
have
babies
at
higher
risk
of
Crohn	B	Crohn	Crohn\u0027s_disease	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crohn's_disease	63522	/m/0h1n9
's
disease
,

disorder
,

said
on
Friday
.

Three
out
of
four
Swedish	B	Swedish	Sweden	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sweden	5058739	/m/0d0vqn
babies
born
to
mothers
who
caught
measles
developed
serious
cases
of
Crohn	B	Crohn	Crohn\u0027s_disease	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crohn's_disease	63522	/m/0h1n9
's
disease
,
the
researchers
said
.

Dr
Andrew	B	Andrew Wakefield	Andrew_Wakefield	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_Wakefield	19990546	/m/05m6dm
Wakefield	I	Andrew Wakefield	Andrew_Wakefield	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_Wakefield	19990546	/m/05m6dm
of
the
Royal	B	Royal Free Hospital School of Medicine	Royal_Free_Hospital	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Free_Hospital	1250182	/m/04m3pb

Hospital	I	Royal Free Hospital School of Medicine	Royal_Free_Hospital	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Free_Hospital	1250182	/m/04m3pb
School	I	Royal Free Hospital School of Medicine	Royal_Free_Hospital	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Free_Hospital	1250182	/m/04m3pb
of	I	Royal Free Hospital School of Medicine	Royal_Free_Hospital	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Free_Hospital	1250182	/m/04m3pb
Medicine	I	Royal Free Hospital School of Medicine	Royal_Free_Hospital	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Free_Hospital	1250182	/m/04m3pb
and

screened
25,000

at
University	B	University Hospital	Uppsala_University_Hospital	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uppsala_University_Hospital	7946227	/m/026l0h9

,
Uppsala	B	Uppsala	Uppsala	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uppsala	31784	/m/07tcs
,

.

had

while

.

"
Three
of

four
children
had
Crohn	B	Crohn	Crohn\u0027s_disease	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crohn's_disease	63522	/m/0h1n9
's
disease
,
"
Wakefield	B	Wakefield	Andrew_Wakefield	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_Wakefield	19990546	/m/05m6dm

Lancet	B	Lancet	The_Lancet	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Lancet	463899	/m/02cmss

.

Crohn	B	Crohn	Crohn\u0027s_disease	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crohn's_disease	63522	/m/0h1n9
's
is
an

of
the

that
can
sometimes
require
surgery
.

It
causes

,

and
weight
loss
.

The
researchers
said
the
three
children
involved
had
especially
severe
cases
.

to
viruses
can
often
cause

.

Most

,

who
get

(
German	B	German	Germany	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany	11867	/m/0345h
measles
)
have
a

risk
of
a

.

-DOCSTART- (70 Garlic)
Garlic
pills
do
n't
lower
cholesterol
,
study
finds
.

LONDON	B	LONDON	London	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London	17867	/m/04jpl
1996-08-22

Garlic
pills
may
not
lower
blood
cholesterol
and
studies
that
show
they
do
may
be
flawed
,
British	B	British	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc
researchers
have
reported
.

A
study
by
a
team
of
doctors
at
Oxford	B	Oxford University	University_of_Oxford	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Oxford	31797	/m/07tgn
University	I	Oxford University	University_of_Oxford	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Oxford	31797	/m/07tgn
has
found
people
with
high
blood
cholesterol
do
not
benefit
significantly
from
taking
garlic
tablets
.

The
study
involved
115
people
with
high
blood
cholesterol
levels
.

They
were
given
900
milligrams
a
day
of
dried
garlic
powder
or
placebo
tablets
.
"

There
were
no
significant
differences
between
the
groups
receiving
garlic
and
placebo
,
"
they
wrote
in
the
Journal	B	Journal of the Royal College of Physicians	--NME--
of	I	Journal of the Royal College of Physicians	--NME--
the	I	Journal of the Royal College of Physicians	--NME--
Royal	I	Journal of the Royal College of Physicians	--NME--
College	I	Journal of the Royal College of Physicians	--NME--
of	I	Journal of the Royal College of Physicians	--NME--
Physicians	I	Journal of the Royal College of Physicians	--NME--
.

Those
taking
part
were
told
to
eat
a
low-fat
diet
for
six
weeks
before
they
started
taking
the
pills
,
and
their
blood
cholesterol
measured
before
and
after
the
six-week
period
.

The
researchers
said
this
would
make
their
findings
more
accurate
.

Several
studies
have
found
garlic
pills
can
lower
blood
pressure
and
blood
cholesterol
.

But
the
Oxford	B	Oxford	University_of_Oxford	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Oxford	31797	/m/07tgn
team
disputed
these
findings
and
said
either
previous
trials
may
have
been
interpreted
incorrectly
,
those
taking
part
were
not
given
special
diets
beforehand
or
the
duration
of
the
studies
may
have
been
too
short
.

The
six-month
trial
was
funded
by
the
British	B	British Heart Foundation	British_Heart_Foundation	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_Heart_Foundation	1489428	/m/055dbd
Heart	I	British Heart Foundation	British_Heart_Foundation	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_Heart_Foundation	1489428	/m/055dbd
Foundation	I	British Heart Foundation	British_Heart_Foundation	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_Heart_Foundation	1489428	/m/055dbd
and
Lichtwer	B	Lichtwer Pharma GmbH	--NME--
Pharma	I	Lichtwer Pharma GmbH	--NME--
GmbH	I	Lichtwer Pharma GmbH	--NME--
,
which
makes
Kwai	B	Kwai	--NME--
brand
garlic
tablets
.

The
study
did
not
address
whether
whole
garlic
could
affect
cholesterol
.

--
London	B	London Newsroom	--NME--
Newsroom	I	London Newsroom	--NME--
+44
171
542
7950

Overseas

non-debt
flows
could

debt-service

to

over
the
next
five
years
.

Russian	B	Russian	Russia	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russia	25391	/m/06bnz

Masterkova	B	Masterkova	Svetlana_Masterkova	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Svetlana_Masterkova	613736	/m/02wndg
all

.

Russian	B	Russian	--NME--

.

Masterkova	B	Masterkova	Svetlana_Masterkova	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Svetlana_Masterkova	613736	/m/02wndg
dominated
the
middle-distance
races
at

recent
Atlanta	B	Atlanta Games	1996_Summer_Olympics	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1996_Summer_Olympics	72311	/m/0jhn7

Zurich	B	Zurich	Z\u00fcrich	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zrich	34453	/m/08966

University	I	Yonsei University	Yonsei_University	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yonsei_University	876553	/m/03kwls
threw
more

--
some

samples

North	B	North Korea	North_Korea	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/North_Korea	21255	/m/05b7q

.

won
rose
against

on
Friday
as

,
after

at
819.10
.

It
ranged
from
817.60
to
819.30
.

"

is

at
the
moment
,
"
said
a

.
"

central

's

intervention
just
above
the
820

convinced

that
it
is

about
supporting
the
won
.

So

began

their
dollar
positions
.
"

THUNDERSTORMS
FORCE
SUSPENSION
OF
SECOND
ROUND
IN
AKRON	B	AKRON	Akron\u002c_Ohio	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Akron,_Ohio	129842	/m/0z20d

AKRON	B	AKRON	Akron\u002c_Ohio	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Akron,_Ohio	129842	/m/0z20d
,
Ohio	B	Ohio	Ohio	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ohio	22199	/m/05kkh
1996-08-23

Thunderstorms
forced
the
suspension
of
the
World	B	World Series of Golf	World_Series_of_Golf	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Series_of_Golf	1536678	/m/03w95gw
Series	I	World Series of Golf	World_Series_of_Golf	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Series_of_Golf	1536678	/m/03w95gw
of	I	World Series of Golf	World_Series_of_Golf	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Series_of_Golf	1536678	/m/03w95gw
Golf	I	World Series of Golf	World_Series_of_Golf	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Series_of_Golf	1536678	/m/03w95gw
after
just
five
players
in
the
43-man
field
had
completed
the
second
round
on
Friday
.

Play
initially
was
interrupted
for
more
than
3-1/2
hours
before
resuming
for
two
hours
.

But
play
was
finally
suspended
for
the
day
when
the
storm
continued
.

The
38
players
are
schedeled
to
resume
their
rounds
on
Saturday
morning
before
the
third
round
begins
.

-DOCSTART- (281 Adventurers)
Adventurers
start
Canadian	B	Canadian	Canada	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canada	5042916	/m/0d060g
wilderness
race
.

PEMBERTON	B	PEMBERTON	Pemberton\u002c_British_Columbia	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pemberton,_British_Columbia	3582046	/m/09mzfg
,
British	B	British Columbia	British_Columbia	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_Columbia	3392	/m/015jr
Columbia	I	British Columbia	British_Columbia	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_Columbia	3392	/m/015jr
1996-08-24

About
350
adventurers
from
nine
countries
set
out
on
Saturday
to
climb
,
raft
,
bike
and
run
in
a
323-mile
(
517-km
)
endurance
race
through
the
Canadian	B	Canadian	Canada	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canada	5042916	/m/0d060g
wilderness
.

The
event
,
called
the
Eco-Challenge	B	Eco-Challenge	--NME--
,
is
part
of
a
growing
sport
known
as
adventure
racing
in
which
competitors
test
their
limits
for
days
over
a
perilous

.

"
I
'm
looking
forward
to
this
race
.

I
think
it
will
be
more
physically
challenging
and
we
'll
have
to
go
up
against
more
diverse
situations
due
to
the
terrain
,
"
said
Dr.
Michael	B	Michael Stroud	--NME--
Stroud	I	Michael Stroud	--NME--
,
a
veteran
Eco-Challenge	B	Eco-Challenge	--NME--
participant
.

The
Eco-Challenge	B	Eco-Challenge	--NME--
has
been
staged
twice
before
--
in
Utah	B	Utah	Utah	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Utah	31716	/m/07srw
and
Maine	B	Maine	--NME--
last
year
--
and
is
modelled
on
similar
races
overseas
.

The
70
teams
in
this
year
's
race
will
will
trek
glaciers
,
climb
mountains
,
whitewater
raft
,
horseback
ride
,
canoe
and
mountain
bike
along
the
grueling
course
.

This
year
's
race
,
the
route
of
which
was
keep
a
secret
until
Friday
evening
,
is
being
held
near
Pemberton	B	Pemberton	Pemberton\u002c_British_Columbia	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pemberton,_British_Columbia	3582046	/m/09mzfg
,
British	B	British Columbia	British_Columbia	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_Columbia	3392	/m/015jr
Columbia	I	British Columbia	British_Columbia	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_Columbia	3392	/m/015jr
,
about
100
miles
(
160
km
)
northeast
of
Vancouver	B	Vancouver	Vancouver	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vancouver	32706	/m/080h2
.

The
area
is
filled
with
treacherous
mountain
peaks
,
ice
fields
and
frigid
waters
.

Organisers
expect
about
two-thirds
of
the
participants
to
drop
out
or
be
disqualified
before
the
finish
.

The
hardy
ones
are
expected
to
complete
the
course
in
about
six
days
,
with
first-place
finishers
receiving
$
10,000
in
prize
money
.

In
the
Eco-Challenge	B	Eco-Challenge	--NME--
,
competitors
race
in
teams
of
five
which
must
include
both
men
and
women
.

Team
members
must
remain
within
100
yards
(
metres
)
of
each
other
at
all
times
and
finish
together
.

With
racers
carrying
about
40
pounds
(
18
kg
)
of
gear
on
their
backs
,
broken
bones
,
sunstroke
,
dehydration
and
exhaustion
are
common
.

Golf	I	World Series of Golf	World_Series_of_Golf	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Series_of_Golf	1536678	/m/03w95gw
by
three
strokes
over
Billy	B	Billy Mayfair	Billy_Mayfair	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Mayfair	2080225	/m/06ksv_
Mayfair	I	Billy Mayfair	Billy_Mayfair	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Mayfair	2080225	/m/06ksv_
on

.

was
the
fourth

this

for

,

for

with
Billy	B	Billy Mayfair	Billy_Mayfair	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Mayfair	2080225	/m/06ksv_

.

at

for

were
Steve	B	Steve Stricker	Steve_Stricker	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Stricker	2310551	/m/072vqz

,

a
68
,

Duffy	B	Duffy Waldorf	Duffy_Waldorf	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duffy_Waldorf	1781343	/m/05wfp7
Waldorf	I	Duffy Waldorf	Duffy_Waldorf	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duffy_Waldorf	1781343	/m/05wfp7
,

.

"

,

.
"

was

,

.
"

Mickelson	B	Mickelson	Phil_Mickelson	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phil_Mickelson	592392	/m/02t8t9
's
victory
gave
him
a
10

to

PGA	B	PGA Tour	PGA_Tour	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PGA_Tour	23546455	/m/01v61b
Tour	I	PGA Tour	PGA_Tour	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PGA_Tour	23546455	/m/01v61b
.

The
$
378,000
first
place
check
brings
Mickelson	B	Mickelson	Phil_Mickelson	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phil_Mickelson	592392	/m/02t8t9
back
to

the

1,574,799

this

.

"
This
is
a
major
championship
golf
course
,
and
for
me
to

on
this
style
of

is

for

and
my

,
"

.

Mickelson	B	Mickelson	Phil_Mickelson	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phil_Mickelson	592392	/m/02t8t9
three-stroke
lead
was
cut
to
two
when
Mayfair	B	Mayfair	Billy_Mayfair	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Mayfair	2080225	/m/06ksv_
birdied
the
course
's
only
easy
hole
,
the
par
five
second
hole
,
while
Mickelson	B	Mickelson	Phil_Mickelson	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phil_Mickelson	592392	/m/02t8t9
three-putted
for
par
from
25
feet
.

On
the
back
nine
Mickelson	B	Mickelson	Phil_Mickelson	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phil_Mickelson	592392	/m/02t8t9
began
driving
erratically
,
and
poor

shots
resulted
in
bogeys
on
the
,
eighth
,
12th
and
13th
holes
,
bringing
Mickelson	B	Mickelson	Phil_Mickelson	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phil_Mickelson	592392	/m/02t8t9
back
to
four
under
par
,
tied
with
Mayfair	B	Mayfair	Billy_Mayfair	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Mayfair	2080225	/m/06ksv_
,
who
had
parred
14

holes
after
the
birdie
on
no.2
.

Mickelson	B	Mickelson	Phil_Mickelson	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phil_Mickelson	592392	/m/02t8t9
then
set
up
a
tap
in
birdie
on
the
16th
,
sending
a
wedge
shot
to
18
inches
.

He
had
another
birdie
on
the
17th
,
where
he
his
a
6-iron
to
six
feet
.

Mayfair	B	Mayfair	Billy_Mayfair	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Mayfair	2080225	/m/06ksv_
bogeyed
the
17th
,
missing
a
five
foot
par
putt
,
and
dropped
from

second

to

for
second
.

It
was
the
second
successive
year
in
which
Mayfair	B	Mayfair	Billy_Mayfair	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Mayfair	2080225	/m/06ksv_

this
tournament
.

lost
to
Greg	B	Greg Norman	Greg_Norman	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greg_Norman	157447	/m/014pxk
Norman	I	Greg Norman	Greg_Norman	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greg_Norman	157447	/m/014pxk
in
sudden
death
last
year
.

defending
champion
was
in

,

.

Chris	B	Chris Lewis	Chris_Lewis_\u0028cricketer\u0029	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Lewis_(cricketer)	1732971	/m/05rxvq
Lewis	I	Chris Lewis	Chris_Lewis_\u0028cricketer\u0029	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Lewis_(cricketer)	1732971	/m/05rxvq
did
his
best
to
forget

from

England	B	England	England_cricket_team	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/England_cricket_team	759125	/m/038zh6

on

could
not

reasserting
their
dominance
in
the
final
test
at
The	B	The Oval	The_Oval	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Oval	387687	/m/022dwr
Oval	I	The Oval	The_Oval	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Oval	387687	/m/022dwr
.

A
super
piece
of
fielding
by
Lewis	B	Lewis	--NME--
,
dropped
as
a
disciplinary
measure
after
arriving
only
35
minutes
before
the
start
on
the
fourth
morning
,
provided
the
only
bright
spot
for
England	B	England	England_cricket_team	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/England_cricket_team	759125	/m/038zh6
as
the
touring
team
batted
on
to
reach
413
for
five
at
the
interval
,
a
lead
of
87
.

The
solitary
wicket
to
fall
was
Asif	B	Asif Mujtaba	Asif_Mujtaba	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asif_Mujtaba	3976606	/m/0b9mgb
Mujtaba	I	Asif Mujtaba	Asif_Mujtaba	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asif_Mujtaba	3976606	/m/0b9mgb
,
run
out
for
13
attempting
a
second
run
to
third
man
where
Lewis	B	Lewis	--NME--
was
lurking
with
a
point
to
prove
.

There
seemed
scant
danger
until
the
Surrey	B	Surrey	Surrey_County_Cricket_Club	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Surrey_County_Cricket_Club	766575	/m/039qmg
player
swooped
on
to
the
ball
and
returned
off
balance
to
county
team
mate
Alec	B	Alec Stewart	Alec_Stewart	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alec_Stewart	896414	/m/03mrbq
Stewart	I	Alec Stewart	Alec_Stewart	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alec_Stewart	896414	/m/03mrbq
who
whipped
off
the
bails
.

Lewis	B	Lewis	--NME--
,
though
,
could
not
make
similar
waves
with
the
ball
as
Salim	B	Salim Malik	Saleem_Malik	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saleem_Malik	938861	/m/03rtbw
Malik	I	Salim Malik	Saleem_Malik	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saleem_Malik	938861	/m/03rtbw
and
Wasim	B	Wasim Akram	Wasim_Akram	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wasim_Akram	501393	/m/02hxp3
Akram	I	Wasim Akram	Wasim_Akram	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wasim_Akram	501393	/m/02hxp3
batted
through
the
rest
of
the
session
with
few

.

Wasim	B	Wasim	Wasim_Akram	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wasim_Akram	501393	/m/02hxp3
rattled
along
to
30
not
out
,
outscoring
his
partner
who
was
unbeaten
on
24
at
the
break
,
although
the
weather
was
again
threatening
to
play
the
dominant
role
.

arrived
just
as
the
players
left
the
field
for

,
forcing

into
action

again
.

weather
delayed

for

,

play
would

again
at
1445
local
time
(

GMT	B	GMT	Greenwich_Mean_Time	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greenwich_Mean_Time	12701	/m/03bdv
)
.

South	B	South Africa	South_Africa	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Africa	17416221	/m/0hzlz
Africa	I	South Africa	South_Africa	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Africa	17416221	/m/0hzlz
's
truth
commission
begins
issuing
subpoenas
this
week
in
a
bid
to
dig
beneath
the
political
rationales
and
find
the
sinister
figures
who
have
the

of

country
's

on

.

of
the

,
from

to

blacks
,
appeared
before
Archbishop
Desmond	B	Desmond Tutu	Desmond_Tutu	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Desmond_Tutu	8401973	/m/02d5w
Tutu	I	Desmond Tutu	Desmond_Tutu	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Desmond_Tutu	8401973	/m/02d5w
's
Truth	B	Truth and Reconciliation Commission	--NME--
and	I	Truth and Reconciliation Commission	--NME--
Reconciliation	I	Truth and Reconciliation Commission	--NME--
Commission	I	Truth and Reconciliation Commission	--NME--
last
week
to
paint

broad

of
their

for
or

.

Most
,
including
former
president
F.W.	B	F.W. de Klerk	F\u002e_W\u002e_de_Klerk	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/F._W._de_Klerk	11479	/m/031k7

and
African	B	African National Congress	African_National_Congress	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/African_National_Congress	2503	/m/0_00
National	I	African National Congress	African_National_Congress	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/African_National_Congress	2503	/m/0_00
Congress	I	African National Congress	African_National_Congress	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/African_National_Congress	2503	/m/0_00
Deputy
President
Thabo	B	Thabo Mbeki	Thabo_Mbeki	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thabo_Mbeki	31350	/m/07q13
Mbeki	I	Thabo Mbeki	Thabo_Mbeki	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thabo_Mbeki	31350	/m/07q13
,
offered

for

.

which
Tutu	B	Tutu	Desmond_Tutu	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Desmond_Tutu	8401973	/m/02d5w
is
investigating
.

Human
rights
lawyer
Brian	B	Brian Currin	Brian_Currin	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Currin	14059389	/m/03csb3_
Currin	I	Brian Currin	Brian_Currin	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Currin	14059389	/m/03csb3_
said
the
hearings
last
week
were
not
intended
as
a
form
of
confessional
and
that
those
who
personally
committed
crimes
during
apartheid
would
testify
only
before
a
separate
arm
of
the
commission
,
the
amnesty
committee
.

"
I
do
n't
think
one
should
have
expected
more
than
what
one
got
,
"
he
said
.
"

That
was
not
the
amnesty
committee
where
perpetrators
are
expected
to
open
their
hearts
and
souls
and
to
tell
it
all
.
"

The
commission
,
which
has
the
power
to
grant
amnesty
to
those
who
confess
to
abuses
,
has
begun
hearing
the
testimony
from
people
already
in
jail
for
their
deeds
.

But
others
,
such
as
self-confessed
secret
police
hit-squad
leader
Dirk	B	Dirk Coetzee	Dirk_Coetzee	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dirk_Coetzee	11288911	/m/02r6fy_
Coetzee	I	Dirk Coetzee	Dirk_Coetzee	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dirk_Coetzee	11288911	/m/02r6fy_
,
have
yet
to
testify
.

-DOCSTART- (391 Corporate)
Corporate
America	B	America	United_States	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States	3434750	/m/09c7w0
taking
new
view
on
compensation
.

Anne	B	Anne Murray	--NME--
Murray	I	Anne Murray	--NME--

NEW	B	NEW YORK	New_York_City	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_City	645042	/m/02_286
YORK	I	NEW YORK	New_York_City	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_City	645042	/m/02_286
1996-08-23

Corporate
America	B	America	United_States	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States	3434750	/m/09c7w0
is
planning
major
changes
in
employee
compensation
in
the
next
few
years
,
according
to
a
recent
study
.

What
it
comes
down
to
is
this
:
If
you
're
highly
skilled
,
you
'll
benefit
nicely
.

But
if
you
're
not
and
cannot
contribute
to
your
employer
's
goals
,
you
'll
be
paid
less
.

The
survey
,
conducted
in
late
1995
and
the
early
part
of
this
year
by
management
consulting
firm
Towers	B	Towers Perrin	Towers_Perrin	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Towers_Perrin	8706816	/m/027fp_w
Perrin	I	Towers Perrin	Towers_Perrin	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Towers_Perrin	8706816	/m/027fp_w
,
showed
that
the
focus
will
be
on
an
employee
's
overall
value
to
the
company
's
bottom
line
--
rather
than
how
well
an
employee
performs
a
specific
task
.

Presently
,
for
example
,
if
an
accountant
's
job
involves
doing
five
specific
tasks
,
he
or
she
can
expect
a
certain
salary
,
said
Sandra	B	Sandra O'Neal	--NME--
O'Neal	I	Sandra O'Neal	--NME--
,
a
Towers	B	Towers Perrin	Towers_Perrin	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Towers_Perrin	8706816	/m/027fp_w
Perrin	I	Towers Perrin	Towers_Perrin	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Towers_Perrin	8706816	/m/027fp_w
principal
.

In
the
future
,
the
accountant
will
be
evaluated
solely
on
"
knowledge
,
skill
and
abilities
,
"
she
said
.

In
addition
to
using
accounting
skills
,
the
accountant
will
also
have
to
be
creative
,
work
well
in
a
team
,
be
sensitive
to
customer
needs
and
set
productivity
goals
.

"
The
good
news
is
,
if
you
're
highly
skilled
and
have
many
abilities
,
you
'll
be
paid
more
,
"
said
O'Neal	B	O'Neal	--NME--
.

"
The
bad
news
is
,
if
you
're
not
skilled
and
ca
n't
contribute
to
a
team
,
to
customer
service
and
the
organisation
's
goals
,
you
'll
be
paid
less
.
"

Of
the
750
mid-to-large
size
corporations
surveyed
,
81
percent
had
undergone
a
major
restructuring
in
the
last
three
years
,
and
more
than
two-thirds
reported
that
productivity
and
profits
were
up
as
result
.

Next
on
the
agenda
for
these
firms
is
developing
a
new
compensation
structure
,
and
78
percent
report
that
they
are
considering
a
new
,
skills-based
plan
for
both
management
and
non-management
employees
.

This
coming
shift
,
O'Neal	B	O'Neal	--NME--
said
,
"
is
not
just
isolated
or
a
fad
.

It
's
an
inexorable
change
.
"

After
World	B	World War II	World_War_II	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_War_II	32927	/m/081pw
War	I	World War II	World_War_II	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_War_II	32927	/m/081pw
II	I	World War II	World_War_II	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_War_II	32927	/m/081pw
,
corporations
adopted
a
"
military
model
"
creating
hierarchical
organisations
where
"
the
concept
of
defined
tasks
worked
great
,
"
she
said
.

But
as
the
economy
became
global
,
customers
were
more
demanding
and
problems
became
more
complex
.

"
Multi-layers
kept
management
at
a
distance
from
its
customers
,
"
O'Neal	B	O'Neal	--NME--
said
.

Now
organisations
must
change
to
stay
competitive
.

O'Neal	B	O'Neal	--NME--
says
firms
will
place
a
greater
emphasis
on
teams
and
team
performance
in
giving
raises
.

If
your
team
does
well
,
you
'll
do
well
.

If
it
does
n't
do
well
,
do
n't
expect
a
raise
.

Is
this
fair
to
an
employee
who
can
go
the
distance
but
is
on
a
team
that
ca
n't
keep
up
?

"
That
's
an
important
question
we
used
to
ask
a
lot
,
"
said
O'Neal	B	O'Neal	--NME--
.
"

It
's
not
a
question
we
ask
any
more
.

The
more
important
question
is
--
'
Do
we
have
results
?
'

"

To
get
those
results
,
27
percent
of
the
companies
surveyed
plan
to
eliminate
base
pay
increases
in
favour
of
cash
bonuses
and
incentives
,
such
as
employee
and
team
award
programmes
and
education
.

Companies
that
can
change
their
culture
and
view
employees
as
business
partners
will
do
well
,
O'Neal	B	O'Neal	--NME--
said
.

For
example
,
the
survey
rated
some
participants
in
the
survey
as
"
high-performing
"
companies
,
based
on
their
return
on
equity
above
16
percent
.

Those
companies
also
said
they
already
offer
employees
variable
pay
and
business
education
,
give
their
managers
more
control
over
pay
decisions
and
celebrate
employee
and
team
success
.

"
They
respect
employees
more
,
they
trust
employees
more
and
they
value
their
employees
more
,
"
O'Neal	B	O'Neal	--NME--
said
.

"
The
key
to
success
at
high-performance
companies
is
engaging
employees
in
a
business
partnership
.

It
will
improve
a
company
's
bottom
line
.
"

.

[

18:00

KIRKLAND	B	KIRKLAND	Kirkland\u002c_Washington	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kirkland,_Washington	138007	/m/010rhw

1996-08-26

Lamonts	B	Lamonts Apparel Inc	--NME--
Apparel	I	Lamonts Apparel Inc	--NME--
Inc	I	Lamonts Apparel Inc	--NME--
,
an
operator
of
42
family
apparel
stores
in
six
northwestern
states
,
said
it
has
filed
a
reorganization
plan
in
bankruptcy
court
in
Seattle	B	Seattle	Seattle	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seattle	11388236	/m/0d9jr
.

(
Corrects
to
make
clear
a
reorganization
plan
has
been
filed
)
.

The
reorganization
plan
calls
for
all
secured
claims
to
be
paid
in
full
.

Unsecured
claims
,
including
those
of
company
bondholders
,
will
be
satisfied
by
issuing
new
common
stock
and
warrants
.

Unsecured
claims
are
estimated
at
about
$
90
million
.

Lamonts	B	Lamonts	Lamonts	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lamonts	6036380	/m/0flszx
said
it
plans
to
issue
9
million
shares
of
new
common
stock
.

Of
that
amount
,
4.05
million
and
5.67
million
shares
will
be
allocated
to
the
company
's
trade
creditors
.

Between
4.75
and
3.13
million
shares
will
be
allocated
to
bondholders
and
other
unsecured
non-trade
creditors
and
200,000
will
be
allocated
to
existing
shareholders
in
exchange
for
all
existing
stock
of
the
company
.

Bondholders
and
other
unsecured
non-trade
creditors
will
receive
warrants
four
about
2.2
million
shares
when
the
company
's
market
capitalization
reaches
$
20
million
.

Bondholders
,
other
unsecured
non-trade
creditors
,
and
existing
shareholders
also
will
receive
warrants
entitling
them
to
roughly
800,000
shares
when
the
company
's
market
capitalization
reaches
$
25
million
.

Management
will
receive
options
to
purchase
10
percent
of
the
company
's
outstanding
common
stock
with
protection
against
dilution
at
an
option
exercise
price
of
$
1
million
.

forecast
an
annual
GDP
rise
of
6.1
percent
in
the
third
quarter
and
4.9
percent
in
Q4
.

The
firm
also
revised
down
its
year-end
peso
forecast
to
7.85-8.15
per
dollar
from
8.20-8.50
.

It
forecast
an
end
1997
peso
in
the
range
of
9.20-9.40
.

Interacciones	B	Interacciones	--NME--
kept
its
1996
and
1997
inflation
forecast
unchanged
at
26
percent
and
20
percent
,
expecting
the
government
's
1997
inflation
target
to
be
around
15
percent
.

It
bumped
up
its
average
interest
rate
projection
in
1997
to
25.8
percent
from
23
percent
.

Fiscal
policy
was
expected
to
be
loosened
a
bit
in
the
second
half
of
this
year
,
boosting
growth
without
running
into
a
deficit
.

"
Next
year
,
the
fiscal
policy
will
have
less
margin
of
freedom
because
the
government
will
have
to
face

has
taken
on

for

,

,
"

said
.

warfare
has
broken
out

the
British	B	British	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc

--

.

British	B	British	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc

"

"

as

.

Famous
names
like
Tarmac	B	Tarmac Plc	--NME--

,

Plc	I	Hanson Plc	Hanson_plc	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hanson_plc	1786946	/m/05ww1x
,

.

,

.
"

"

,

.

.

Graham	B	Graham Watts	--NME--
Watts	I	Graham Watts	--NME--
,

"

more

than
they
were
3-4
years
ago
.

There
's
no
doubt
it
's
a
big
issue
now
.
"

He
says
the
damage
comes
in
two
forms
:
"
Tangible
--
in
the
form
of
extra
costs
,
additional
security
,
threats
to
staff
and
the
more
intangible
damage
caused
by
negative
publicity
.
"

Watts	B	Watts	--NME--
said
the
cost
of
protesting
can
be
heavy
once
the
company
is
locked
into
a
contract
.

"

on

at

and

.
"

.

"

"

.

"

Earth	B	Earth First	--NME--

Simon	B	Simon Brown	--NME--
Brown	I	Simon Brown	--NME--

,

largest
in
Europe	B	Europe	Europe	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Europe	9239	/m/02j9z
and
second
in

only
to
Rio	B	Rio	Rio_de_Janeiro	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rio_de_Janeiro	25936	/m/06gmr
,

peacefully
on
Monday
with
an
estimated
800,000
revellers
singing
and
dancing

away
in
high
spirits
.

Police
said
they
made
30
arrests
and
there
were
two
stabbings
.

But
there
was
no
repeat
of
the
ugly
scenes
that
used

scar

street

,
and
police
praised

over

as

.

Around
400
police
were
wounded
in
riots
in
1976
when
the
carnival
,
now
in
its
31st
year
,
acquired
its
darker
reputation
from
which
it
is
now
only
slowly

.

Shopkeepers
still
board
up
their
windows
and
many
residents
leave
town
for
the
weekend
,
but
for
four
or
five
years
there
has
been
no
disorder
and
relatively
little
crime
.

1996-08-27

Dark
northern
spring
and
white
wheat
bids
were
mostly
steady
on
Tuesday
but
a

locations
quoted
weaker

as
newly

spring
wheat
flooded
the
market
,

said
.

"

down
,
"

said
.

there

10

per

.

was
also

well
in
parts
of

-DOCSTART- (589 U.S.)
U.S.	B	U.S.	United_States	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States	3434750	/m/09c7w0
bulk
millfeeds
-
Immediate
supply
tight
.

CHICAGO	B	CHICAGO	Chicago	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago	6886	/m/01_d4
1996-08-27

Millfeed
supplies
for
prompt
shipment
remained
tight
and
prices
continued
to
move
higher
,
millfeed
dealers
said
.

High-priced
corn
and
increased
demand
for
livestock
feed
continued
to
support
millfeed
prices
in
nearly
all
sectors
.

Flour
mills
sold
much
of
their
production
through
September
leaving
little
available
for
prompt
shipment
.

Portland	B	Portland	Portland\u002c_Oregon	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portland,_Oregon	23503	/m/02frhbc
sources
said
feed
mixer
demand
was
keeping
pace
with
millfeed
production
and
driving
prices
higher
.

Portland	B	Portland	Portland\u002c_Oregon	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portland,_Oregon	23503	/m/02frhbc
sources
said
with
corn
priced
there
at
$
200
per
ton
and
barley
at
$
140
,
the
millfeeds
at
$
125
represent
a
good
value
.

In
the
southeast
U.S.	B	U.S.	United_States	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States	3434750	/m/09c7w0
,
dealers
said
feed
mixers
continued
to
be
steady
buyers
with
demand
increasing
for
October
to
March
positions
.

The
closely-watched
Kansas	B	Kansas City	Kansas_City\u002c_Missouri	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kansas_City,_Missouri	17454	/m/04f_d
City	I	Kansas City	Kansas_City\u002c_Missouri	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kansas_City,_Missouri	17454	/m/04f_d
rail
market
was
steady
at
$
115
per
ton
bid
and
$
118
offered
.

--

newsdesk

TOKYO	B	TOKYO	Tokyo	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo	30057	/m/07dfk

,

Sakai	B	Sakai	Sakai\u002c_Osaka	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sakai,_Osaka	466743	/m/02cypp

in

"

"
,

was
quoted
by

as

.

The
O-157	B	O-157	--NME--
colon

has
been

a

that

and

this

Sakai	B	Sakai	Sakai\u002c_Osaka	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sakai,_Osaka	466743	/m/02cypp
,
near
the

Osaka	B	Osaka	Osaka	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Osaka	52230	/m/0dqyw

,

,

.

have
died

.

.

Sakai	B	Sakai	Sakai\u002c_Osaka	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sakai,_Osaka	466743	/m/02cypp

agreed
with
the
assessment
,
but

was

.

"

,
"

in

,

.

for
school

in
September
and

,
when

around

country
resume
.

Japan	B	Japan	Japan	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan	15573	/m/03_3d

surge
8.9
pct
in
July
.

TOKYO	B	TOKYO	Tokyo	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo	30057	/m/07dfk
1996-08-27

Japanese	B	Japanese	Japan	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan	15573	/m/03_3d
shipments
of
aluminium
mill
products
in
July
surged
8.9
percent
over
the
same
month
last
year
to
224,609
tonnes
,
while
production
rose
6.4
percent
to
222,457
tonnes
,
according
to

data
released
on
Tuesday
by
the
Japan	B	Japan Aluminium Federation	--NME--
Aluminium	I	Japan Aluminium Federation	--NME--
Federation	I	Japan Aluminium Federation	--NME--
.

The
surge
reflected
strong
demand
from
the
beverage
can
and
housing
construction
sectors
,
federation
officials
said
.

Figures
released
two
weeks
ago
from
Japan	B	Japan	Japan	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan	15573	/m/03_3d
's
seven
largest
mills
already
showed
that
Japan	B	Japan	Japan	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan	15573	/m/03_3d
's
can
sheet
output
reached
its
highest
monthly
level
ever
in
July
,
reflecting
above-average
temperatures
that
sparked
a
jump
in
beer
consumption
.

A
federation
official
added
that
the
half-year
through
September
1996
also
appeared
likely
to
set
a
new
record
for
can
production
,
despite
cooler
temperatures
in
August
.

July
inventories
stood
at
75,632
tonnes
,
down
2.6
percent
from
the
prior
month
.

July
foil
output
was
off
0.2
percent
year-on-year
at
11,525
tonnes
,
while
foil
shipments
fell
0.8
percent
to
11,244
tonnes
.

June
mill
output
data
were
revised
slightly
downward
to
210,622
tonnes
from
the
preliminary
210,683
,
while
shipments
were
revised
marginally
upward
to
213,989
tonnes
from
213,845
.

Final
figures
for
June
pegged
can
stock
shipments
at
40,144
tonnes
,
up
2.4
percent
year-on-year
.

Shipments
to
the
auto
sector
fell
5.5
percent
to
15,286
tonnes
,
while
the
construction
sector
rose
2.4
percent
to
79,390
tonnes
.

Exports
dipped
3.7
percent
to
18,867
tonnes
.

called

in

.

-DOCSTART- (633 SEC)
SEC	B	SEC	--NME--
adopts
rules
to
improve
investor
access
to
best
stock
prices
.

WASHINGTON	B	WASHINGTON	Washington\u002c_D\u002eC\u002e	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washington,_D.C.	108956	/m/0rh6k
1996-08-28

The
Securities	B	Securities and Exchange Commission	--NME--
and	I	Securities and Exchange Commission	--NME--
Exchange	I	Securities and Exchange Commission	--NME--
Commission	I	Securities and Exchange Commission	--NME--
Wednesday
approved
rules
designed
to
give
stock
market
investors
a
better
chance
at
getting
the
best
price
available
for
their
orders
.

The
so-called
order
handling
rules
,
which
were
proposed
last
September
,
were
approved
in
a
4-0
vote
.

The
new
rules
will
require
specialists
at
stock
exchanges
and
market
makers
on
Nasdaq	B	Nasdaq	NASDAQ	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NASDAQ	21559	/m/05dq_
to
allow
customers
to
view
price
quotes
from
other
electronic
trading
systems
that
may
not
be
readily
available
to
them
.

The
rules
will
also
require
that
customer
limit
orders
be
displayed
with
prices
better
than
those
available
in
quotes
publicly
available
at
the
time
.

Specialists
and
market
makers
are
companies
or
individuals
recognised
as
qualified
to
maintain
an
orderly
market
in
a
stock
.

In
a
limit
order
,
investors
specify
the
price
at
which
they
are
willing
to
buy
or
sell
,
as
opposed
to
a
market
order
executed
at
prevailing
prices
.

"
These
rules
are
intended
to
empower
all
investors
,
by
allowing
their
orders
to
compete
on
a
level
playing
field
,
and
by
providing
the
disclosure
they
need
to
make
informed
decisions
,
"
said
SEC	B	SEC	--NME--
Chairman
Arthur	B	Arthur Levitt	Arthur_Levitt	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Levitt	902148	/m/03wy8m1
Levitt	I	Arthur Levitt	Arthur_Levitt	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Levitt	902148	/m/03wy8m1
.

The
SEC	B	SEC	--NME--
's
goal
,
he
added
,
was
to
create
"
one
system
where
one
price
could
be
available
to
everybody
.
"

The
director
of
the
SEC	B	SEC	--NME--
's
division
of
market
regulation
,
Richard	B	Richard Lindsey	--NME--
Lindsey	I	Richard Lindsey	--NME--
,
said
Wall	B	Wall Street	Wall_Street	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wall_Street	37274	/m/09937
Street	I	Wall Street	Wall_Street	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wall_Street	37274	/m/09937
firms
will
probably
need
to
spend
about
$
7
million
to
carry
out
the
improvements
called
for
by
the
new
rules
.

In
proposing
the
rules
last
year
,
the
SEC	B	SEC	--NME--
noted
that
while
technology
has
improved
,
commonplace
practices
still
existed
that
worked
against
investors
'
best
interests
.

It
noted
that
customers
whose
orders
were
not
displayed
lost
the
chance
of
getting
the
best
possible
price
available
in
the
market
.

It
also
cited
the
potential
problem
of
a
two-tiered
market
in
which
market
makers
quote
one
price
to
public
investors
while
quoting
better
prices
in
private
systems
,
thus
robbing
investors
without
access
to
"
hidden
"
quotes
the
benefit
of
the
best
available
prices
.

Earlier
this
month
,
the
SEC	B	SEC	--NME--
settled
charges
of
alleged
malpractices
on
Nasdaq	B	Nasdaq	NASDAQ	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NASDAQ	21559	/m/05dq_
when
the
parent
of
the
Nasdaq	B	Nasdaq	NASDAQ	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NASDAQ	21559	/m/05dq_
market
,
the
National	B	National Association of Securities Dealers	--NME--
Association	I	National Association of Securities Dealers	--NME--
of	I	National Association of Securities Dealers	--NME--
Securities	I	National Association of Securities Dealers	--NME--
Dealers	I	National Association of Securities Dealers	--NME--
,
agreed
to
spend
$
100
million
over
five
years
to
upgrade
its
oversight
of
brokers
'
trading
practices
.

The
SEC	B	SEC	--NME--
dropped
a
third
proposal
that
would
have
allowed
investors
with
market
orders
to
trade
at
a
better
price
if
there
were
shifts
in
prices
before
their
orders
were
executed
.

The
agency
said
it
would
monitor
effects
of
the
two
new
rules
before
considering
the
"
price
improvement
"
proposal
again
.

The
agency
also
proposed
rule
changes
that
would
require
continuous
"
bid
"
and
"
ask
"
quotations
from
exchange
specialists
and
market
makers
who
trade
more
than
1
percent
of
a
stock
during
any
quarter
on
Nasdaq	B	Nasdaq	NASDAQ	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NASDAQ	21559	/m/05dq_
.

The
SEC	B	SEC	--NME--
's
limit
order
display
rule
will
mean
a
major
change
for
Nasdaq	B	Nasdaq	NASDAQ	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NASDAQ	21559	/m/05dq_
,
where
such
orders
have
never
been
displayed
.

The
president
of
the
Nasdaq	B	Nasdaq	NASDAQ	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NASDAQ	21559	/m/05dq_
,
Alfred	B	Alfred Berkeley	Alfred_Berkeley	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfred_Berkeley	4277016	/m/0btqln
Berkeley	I	Alfred Berkeley	Alfred_Berkeley	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfred_Berkeley	4277016	/m/0btqln
,
was
to
hold
a
news
conference
Wednesday
afternoon
to
elaborate
on
the
new
rules
'
effects
on
the
market
,
the
second
largest
in
the
world
.

The

"

past

,
Tendulkar	B	Tendulkar	Sachin_Tendulkar	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sachin_Tendulkar	57570	/m/0fszd
completed
his
ninth
century
in
one-day
cricket
,
taking
138
balls
to
do
it
before
being
run
out
.

The
rest
of
the
Indian	B	Indian	India_national_cricket_team	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/India_national_cricket_team	407754	/m/024nj1
batting
was
generally
tied
down
by
brilliant
fielding
and
some
fairly
tight
bowling
,
although
ex-captain
Mohamed	B	Mohamed Azharuddin	--NME--

chipped
in
with
58
,

129
with
Tendulkar	B	Tendulkar	Sachin_Tendulkar	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sachin_Tendulkar	57570	/m/0fszd
off
28
overs
,
before
being

.

-DOCSTART- (700 UK)
UK	B	UK	--NME--
lowers
noise
limits
for
three
London	B	London	London	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London	17867	/m/04jpl
airports
.

LONDON	B	LONDON	London	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London	17867	/m/04jpl
1996-08-28

The
British	B	British	United_Kingdom	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom	31717	/m/07ssc
government
on
Wednesday
lowered
the
noise
limits
for
London	B	London	London	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London	17867	/m/04jpl
's
Heathrow	B	Heathrow	Heathrow\u002c_London	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heathrow,_London	94089	/m/0n9z1
,
Gatwick	B	Gatwick	Gatwick_Airport	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gatwick_Airport	101359	/m/0pr6s
and
Stansted	B	Stansted	London_Stansted_Airport	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London_Stansted_Airport	65456	/m/0hcsh
airports
and
announced
it
would
make
a
bigger
effort
in
detecting
and
fining
violators
.

The
limits
,
effective
from
January
1
,
1997
,
are
reduced
as
much
as
possible
while
still
complying
with
international
obligations
,
a
spokesman
for
the
Department	B	Department of Transport	--NME--
of	I	Department of Transport	--NME--
Transport	I	Department of Transport	--NME--
said
.

The
maximum
noise
level
during
the
day
is
trimmed
by
three
decibels
to
94
,
while
the
night
time
level
is
reduced
by
two
decibels
to
87
.

"
It
is
a
smaller
reduction
in
terms
of
loudness
than
was
sought
by
local
people
.

Nevertheless
I
am
satisfied
that
the
overall
benefits
will
be
worthwile
,
"
Lord
Goschen	B	Goschen	--NME--
,
minister
for
aviation
,
said
in
a
statement
.

The
ministry
said
it
believed
the
new
limits
could
be
met
with
existing
aircraft
.
"

They
can
be
flown
in
quieter
ways
,
"
a
spokesman
said
.

The
reduction
in
noise
levels
is
the
same
as
proposed
in
a
consultation
paper
which
was
published
in
October
1995
.

The
present
noise
levels
have
applied
at
Heathrow	B	Heathrow	Heathrow\u002c_London	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heathrow,_London	94089	/m/0n9z1
,
one
of
the
world
's
busiest
airports
,
since
1959
and
at
Gatwick	B	Gatwick	Gatwick_Airport	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gatwick_Airport	101359	/m/0pr6s
since
1968
.

The
number
of
monitors
will
be
increased
and
some
will
be
repositioned
to
detect
noisy
planes
.

in

.

Bank	B	Bank of Japan	Bank_of_Japan	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bank_of_Japan	188155	/m/019rb6
of	I	Bank of Japan	Bank_of_Japan	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bank_of_Japan	188155	/m/019rb6
Japan	I	Bank of Japan	Bank_of_Japan	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bank_of_Japan	188155	/m/019rb6
's

,

"

"
,
of

--

.

The

weak

that
Japanese	B	Japanese	Japan	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan	15573	/m/03_3d

.

Japanese	B	Japanese	Japan	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan	15573	/m/03_3d

.

"

"

-DOCSTART- (772 Spanish)
Spanish	B	Spanish	Spain	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain	26667	/m/06mkj
tomato
warriors
paint
the
town
red
.

BUNOL	B	BUNOL	Bu\u00f1ol	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buol	277229	/m/01ph0m
,
Spain	B	Spain	Spain	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain	26667	/m/06mkj
1996-08-28

Revellers
painted
the
town
red
on
Wednesday
as
the
1996
edition
of
the
world
's
biggest
tomato
fight
began
in
the
eastern
Spanish	B	Spanish	Spain	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain	26667	/m/06mkj
village
of
Bunol	B	Bunol	Bu\u00f1ol	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buol	277229	/m/01ph0m
.

Thousands
of
people
pelted
each
other
with
armfuls
of
ripe
tomatoes
as
streets
,
walls
and
windows
were
coated
in
a
blood-red
wash
.

A
single
firework
after
midday
signalled
the
start
of
the
fruit-throwing
frenzy
,
during
which
participants
hurl
some
100
tonnes
of
tomatoes
trucked
in
for
the
occasion
.

Local
historians
say
the
tradition
began
in
1945
when
disgruntled
locals
began
spontaneously
to
bombard
the
priest
and
mayor
at
the
annual
fiesta
in
Bunol	B	Bunol	Bu\u00f1ol	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buol	277229	/m/01ph0m
(
pronounced
Boo-nee-OL	B	Boo-nee-OL	--NME--
)
.

The
festival
's
fame
has
grown
and
now
attracts
between
15,000
and
20,000
people
,
many
of
them
foreigners
.

shown
progress
in
laboratory
animals
.

Word
of
the
findings
,
to
be
published
in
the
Oct.
1
issue
of
the
journal
"
Human	B	Human Gene Therapy	--NME--
Gene	I	Human Gene Therapy	--NME--
Therapy	I	Human Gene Therapy	--NME--
,
"
came
in
advance
of
the
annual
Jerry	B	Jerry Lewis Labour Day	--NME--
Lewis	I	Jerry Lewis Labour Day	--NME--
Labour	I	Jerry Lewis Labour Day	--NME--
Day	I	Jerry Lewis Labour Day	--NME--
weekend
telethon
to
raise
money
for
muscular
dystrophy
research
.

Several
hurdles
must
be
overcome
before
the
method
is
used
in
human
trials
.

Nevertheless
,
"
a
treatment
based
on
the
new
strategy
....
may
have
the
potential
to
benefit
many
patients
,
"
the
University	B	University of Pennsylvania	University_of_Pennsylvania	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Pennsylvania	31793	/m/07tds
of	I	University of Pennsylvania	University_of_Pennsylvania	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Pennsylvania	31793	/m/07tds
Pennsylvania	I	University of Pennsylvania	University_of_Pennsylvania	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Pennsylvania	31793	/m/07tds
Medical
Centre
said
in
a
release
.

Muscular
dystrophy
is
a
fatal
illness
in
which
the
body
's
muscle
tissue
degenerates
and
is
replaced
by
fat
.

Death
strikes
in
early
adulthood
.

Individuals
with
the
disease
have
a
non-working
version
of
a
gene
responsible
for
producing
a
crucial
muscle
protein
called
dystrophin
.

In
the
study
at
the
University
's
Institute	B	Institute for Human Gene Therapy	--NME--
for	I	Institute for Human Gene Therapy	--NME--
Human	I	Institute for Human Gene Therapy	--NME--
Gene	I	Institute for Human Gene Therapy	--NME--
Therapy	I	Institute for Human Gene Therapy	--NME--
,
researchers
altered
a
common-cold
virus
to
carry
a
version
of
the
working
dystrophin
gene
.

The
virus
,
which
also
was
altered
to
minimise
its
susceptibility
to
the
immune
system
,
was
then
injected
into
the
muscle
cells
of
mice
bred
to
lack
dystrophin
genes
.

In
the
experiment
,
between
30
to
40
percent
of
the
muscle
fibers
in
one
group
of
mice
produced
dystrophin
for
two
weeks
before
diminishing
.

Similar
results
had
been
obtained
previously
in
test-tube
cell
cultures
,
but
not
in
live
animals
,
the
university
said
.

The
university
said
methods
are
still
needed
to
make
enough
of
the
altered
virus
to
treat
humans
,
to
further
decrease
the
immune-system
response
to
the
virus
,
and
to
deliver
the
virus
to
human
muscle
tissue
.

.

.

.

.

National	B	National Archives	--NME--

North	B	North	--NME--

Archives	B	Archives	--NME--

.

of

,

,

have
focused
on
African	B	African American	African_American	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/African_American	2154	/m/0x67

in

this
year
of
a

to
black

who
fought
in
the
war
.

More

fought

37,000

.

heading
South	B	South	--NME--
wrote

,
"
